column3: It was a very hot day, so we {{c1::went swimming}} in the river.
There's plenty of snow in the mountains, so we'll be able to {{c1::go skiing}}.
Helen has two horses. She {{c1::goes riding}} regularly.
Dan has {{c1::gone shopping}}. There were a few things he needed to buy.
I won't be at home tomorrow. I'm {{c1::going fishing}}.
We spent a few days in Paris. On our first day we {{c1::went sightseeing}}.
